ygData.subject: Re: Where to go?
ygData.msgSnippet: There s still plenty of blue critters in the mino cave area of Steamfont.  Perhaps you just hit a bad time.  I levelled all the way up to 14 there (and still
ygData.messageBody:
There's still plenty of blue critters in the mino cave area of Steamfont. Perhaps you just hit a bad time. I levelled all the way up to 14 there (and still some are blue, but not many). On Faydwer soloing, I'd probably hit Crushbone, though it's hard to get a legionaire without also getting more than you can handle. East Commons is another good place (one zone away from W. Freeport).
----- Original Message -----
From: Tanthalias
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Sent: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 8:28 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Where to go?


I just reached level 12, and now the things I used to hunt in Steamfront all con green. Where should I go from here? I could stay here and kill mino's, but they're too hard to find (camped most of the time). Where should I go from here? What's good for level 12? Any help is greatly appreciated.

Tanthalias
Half Elven Bard, 12th Circle
Tarew Marr
